entry.name: Data_11 - Rice (Oryza sativa) - Orbitrap - leaves, cell lysate
entry.description: Data downloaded from [[http://www.marcottelab.org/MSdata/Data_11/ authors" website]], data file Sus1_b.RAW. Auithors" description of sample preparation was as follows: {{i}}To prepare protein extracts, cells were re-suspended in an equal volume of lysis buffer (50mM Tris pH 8.0, 50mM NaCl, 1mM EDTA and 1 tablet of Complete Proteinase Inhibitor (Roche)/10ml) and incubated on ice for 30 minutes. Cells were then lysed with a dounce homogenizer and the soluble protein extracts obtained after centrifugation. For better lysis, 0.05% NP40 was added as a detergent. Prior to trypsin digest, detergent was removed using the Orgosol Detergent-Out kit. {{/i}}
